title: Hextech Crafting
body:
I was leveling my smurf and when i reached level 5, there were no beginner chests, just nothing. If you guys dont do that anymore just tell me but if you still do it can i get some help. My smurf is on the EUW server and the user is: Ranodin47
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Sometimes there's a delay in the chest and key getting sent out, but it should arrive shortly after reaching level 5. I took a look at your account and it seems you should have received it by now. 

Let me know if you're still having issues with this.
